content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Haoyu Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Hello, Haoyu Wang. I am glad you are interested in my apartment. Let's indeed discuss the rental price. How much are you willing to pay for this newly built, unfurnished 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment in the city center, close to all important facilities?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Schmidt, could you give me a price for the unfurnished apartment? I want to know the initial price to see how much room there is for negotiation.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Certainly, Haoyu Wang. I am looking to rent out this apartment for the highest price possible. To give you an idea of my expectations, I would be open to considering an offer around 1,200 Euros per month. However, if you feel this is too high, I am willing to negotiate. Please let me know your thoughts on this initial price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I appreciate your initial offer, but I think it is a bit high for my budget. Could you consider lowering the price by 100 euros? I am a dependable tenant, and I am willing to sign a long-term lease.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I'm sorry to hear that you find the price high, Haoyu Wang. However, I must emphasize that this apartment is brand new and in a prime location, which justifies the premium price. A lower price might be possible, but I would need to consider the terms of the lease and your creditworthiness. If you are willing to sign a long-term lease and provide good references, I might be able to negotiate a slight reduction. How long were you thinking about for the lease term?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I was thinking about a three-year lease, and I am willing to pay 1100 euros. I am a trustworthy tenant, and I always pay my rent on time. I am also responsible and will take good care of your apartment.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Your offer of 1,100 euros for a three-year lease is an interesting one, Haoyu Wang. While it is still higher than my initial expectation, the long-term stability of a three-year lease does add value. I am willing to accept your offer under certain conditions. First, I would require a substantial deposit to secure the apartment, say two months' rent upfront. Additionally, I would like to include a clause in the lease that states you will be responsible for all maintenance and repairs, excluding structural issues. If you are agreeable to these terms, I am prepared to sign the lease at 1,100 euros per month.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you for considering my offer. I am willing to pay a two-month deposit, and I am also okay with being responsible for all maintenance and repairs excluding structural issues. I agree to the price of 1100 Euros with these conditions.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Excellent, Haoyu Wang. I am pleased to hear that we have reached an agreement. The lease will be drafted with the specified terms. Please ensure that you read it carefully before signing. Once both parties have signed the lease, the arrangement will be official. Thank you for choosing my apartment, and I look forward to a long and fruitful relationship as landlord and tenant. TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
